news_header: Nigeria faces rising fuel prices and deadly incidents related to fuel collection.
news_text: Despite having large oil reserves, Nigeria has seen fuel prices increase five times in the past year. A recent fuel tank explosion in Jigawa resulted in at least 140 deaths and numerous injuries, with the death toll expected to rise. The explosion followed a road accident involving a fuel tank truck, and many victims were attempting to collect fuel from the wreckage. Such incidents are common in Nigeria, where economic crises lead residents to gather fuel from accidents.
